meanings.definition: Smooth-talking or ingratiating in a way that is perceived as insincere or manipulative.
meanings.sent1: The salesman's schmoozier smile made me suspicious of his intentions.
meanings.sent2: She always wears her schmoozier outfit to charm her way into getting what she wants.
meanings.sent3: His schmoozier compliments were so over-the-top that they made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The politician's schmoozier promises were like candy - sweet but empty.
meanings.sent5: The cat's schmoozier purring was a clever way to get extra treats.

meanings.definition: To engage in smooth-talking or ingratiating behavior in order to gain favor or advantage.
meanings.sent1: He tried to schmoozier his way into the exclusive club by flattering the bouncer.
meanings.sent2: She schmooziers with the boss to get better assignments at work.
meanings.sent3: The student schmooziered with the teacher to get an extension on the assignment.
meanings.sent4: The fox schmooziered the hen into letting her guard down before pouncing.
meanings.sent5: The car salesman schmooziered the customer into buying a more expensive model.
